summary: A small mod that makes the Spectral Assassin (Lucien Lachance) look like he did in The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:

[/font][/size][size=5]


[/size][font=Georgia][i][b][size=5][color=#cc0000]HELP WANTED! [/color]

[/size][/b][/i][/font][font=Georgia]WIP: I need to retexture his robes; I used the Mythic Dawn Robes and have renamed them, but they are still red and yellow (the red with his ghostly blue make him look purple-ish). I will also add Black Hand Robes to the Dawnstar Sanctuary after I learn how to retexture the models. (I would gladly accept help from anyone who knows how to edit .dds files. I mainly need to be recommended an application with which to do it.) He looks okay as is, but he isn't perfect.
[b][color=#ff0000]I DON'T PLAN TO UPLOAD THE FILE TO NEXUS UNTIL IT IS COMPLETE.[/color] [/b]You can get the bare minimum version from Steam [url=http://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=262254414]here[/url][/font][font=Georgia][i].[/i][/font][font=Georgia][i][b][size=5]

What is this mod?



Reason for this mod



Future of this mod (?)[/size]
[/b][/i][/font][font=Georgia]
This is a mod that makes the Spectral Assassin look more like he did in Oblivion. [/font]

[font=Georgia]I disliked the vanilla depiction of Lucien. His outfit made him look less like an assassin and more like a disco dancer. ("Yes Cicero, there is dancing in the Void...") [/font]

[font=Georgia]If you are a Lucien Lachance advocate you will appreciate this mod! [/font]

[font=Georgia]I'd looked all over the internet and no one else had created a mod that gave Lucien any justice; as a Lucien Lachance fan, this motivated me to create one for myself. I've only ever tinkered with the Creation/Construction Kits for Elder Scrolls games before, so I still need some aid in certain aspects... [/font]

[font=Georgia]UPDATE 1.1: Created the Black Hand Robes, Black Hand Gloves, and Black Hand Shoes and placed them in the Dawnstar Sanctuary on a table parallel to the one the Jester Clothes are located on (for the sake of symmetry).[/font]
author: MurderMagic8
